sentences.en: Mom was incensed at his lack of compassion.
sentences.cn: 妈妈对他缺乏同情心非常愤怒。

sentences.en: Elderly people need time and compassion from their physicians.
sentences.cn: 老年人需要医生的时间和同情心。

sentences.en: Confucianism and Taoism both stress the importance of compassion.
sentences.cn: 儒家和道家都强调同情的重要性。
